oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carey Chapel AME Church: sign and front facade
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carey Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church;

Color photograph of a white metalwork sign for Carey Chapel AME Church. The sign features decorative metal scrollwork in the supports and a bell mounted above the lettering for the church name. The entire sign and bell are white. In the background is a small white church. The entrance is double doors behind metal security doors below a small projecting portico on a gable end. A steeple rises from the roof line. Four large rectangular windows line the side wall. The setting is rural.
Carey Chapel is close to Bright Hill Baptist Church and near the intersection of Jamestown Rd. and Jamestown Lane.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Rural churches
Churches
